special_text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, untap up to one permanent you control. You may cast spells as though they had flash until end of turn.
[+2]: Surveil 1, then draw a card.
[-3]: Choose a nonland, non-Xirix card name. Exile all permanents with that name.
[-9]: Shuffle any number of cards from your graveyard into your library. Xirix deals that much damage to any non-Xirix target, and you gain that much life.
